metadata.synopsis: The sentry guard talks with the grief attendant.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Talk to the door sentry in house of grief2. Pass easy deception check to make him go to the attendant.3. Finish dialog.4. Wait

1.speaker: Morann
1.text: Is it true then? You gave that one permission to enter?

0.speaker: Mirie
0.text: What are you talking about? Of course not - you know the rules.
